home_desc_introduction: Each person has a unique story that would be more beautiful if it has a professional path as free of impediments as possible.
home_desc_next: is here to make the job search and recruitment process a simple and efficient experience. We promote transparency among employers and candidates.
home_desc_candidate: you can discover and take the first step towards a successful career.
home_desc_emp: you can find the most outstanding talent to elevate your success.
username_len: Username must have at least 3 characters.
username_content: Username must contain only letters, digits, - and spaces.
password_len: Password must have at least 5 characters.
password_confirm: Password and Confirm Password must match.
auth_error: An error occurred when trying to register.
token_error: An error occurred when trying to check the token.
token_success: The account was verified with success!
token_invalid_email: Invalid email for checking the account. Try again!
login_error: An error occurred when trying to login.
password_helper: There is no problem! In what follows, we will instruct you to reset it in order to be able to return to the application's functionalities.
password_helper2: In order to reset the password, please start by writing your email below:
reset_error: An error occurred when trying to reset the password.
password_invalid_email: Invalid email for resetting the account. Try again!
password_success: The password was changed with success!
reset_helper: An email containing a token was sent to the email address previously filled in.
reset_helper2: Please fill in the new password below, its confirmation and the token sent by email. If the token entered is a valid one, then the password will be updated.
lastname_len: Lastname must have at least 3 characters.
firstname_len: Firstname must have at least 3 characters.
company_len: Company name must have at least 3 characters.
company_content: Company name can't contain invalid character.
notfound2: We're sorry, but the page you're looking for doesn't exist!
error_message: Sorry, we can't find the page you're looking for.
reason_1: The searched page has been moved or deleted.
reason_2: The link you entered is an old one.
reason_3: The link you entered is not spelled correctly.
candidate_cv_reason: Before you can continue with the rest of the functionalities, it is necessary to add a CV.
fill_default_template: Fill out the following template that will generate a standard CV
photo_format: You can add a photo in jpg or png format.
description_req: The description must have at least 100 characters.
summary_in: Summary must have at least 100 characters.
year_in: Difference between current year and this year can't be greater than 100
title: Title
work_present: Check if you currently work for this company
start_finish_year: Start year cannot be greater than end year
min_ed: At least one education must be added
delete_err: An error occurred when deleting the account.
update_account_err: An error occurred when trying to update the account.
message_account_delete: Are you sure you want to delete the account? It will be permanently deleted, with no possibility of recovery. You will no longer be able to perform any actions related to this account.
password_err: Password must have at least 5 characters.
confirm_password_err: Password and Confirm Password must match.
change_pass_condition: The next two fields will only be completed if a password change is desired.
cv_err: An error occurred while trying to retrieve CVs.
add_cv_err: An error occurred while trying to add a CV.
add_cv_success: The CV has been successfully saved.
multiple_cv_motivation: A detailed CV is essential for you to highlight your skills and experience clearly and convincingly. With multiple resume options, you can customize each application to the specific job requirements. This approach allows you to highlight the relevant aspects of your experience and tailor it more precisely to the requirements and organizational culture. Furthermore, by providing multiple CVs, you can explore different aspects of your career and highlight specific skills or achievements for each position, which can make a difference in the selection process and attract the attention of employers.
add_cv_option: Choose one of the two options below to add a CV:
cv_list_err: An error occurred when trying to retrieving the resumes.
sort_cv_date_desc: Sort the list descending by date
job_list_err: An error occurred when trying to retrieving the jobs.
search_by_title_or_company: Search by job title or company name...
sort_job_asc: Sort jobs ascending by post date
sort_job_desc: Sort jobs descending by post date
no_jobs_explanation: No jobs have been added or no jobs match the selected criteria.
no_job_city: No job has been added in any city.
no_job_region: No job has been added in any region.
no_job_country: No job has been added in any country.
see_more_about_job: See more details about the job
profile_err: An error occurred when trying to retrieving the profile.
address_not_found: The address cannot be displayed on the map, it must be checked that it is entered correctly
app_err: An error occurred when trying to check the status of the application.
choose_a_cv_ex: Choose a CV with which to apply for this job
answer_questions_ex: The following questions were asked by the employer to get to know you better. Please respond to them.
answer_err: The answer must have between 10 and 4000 characters.
submit_apply_err: An error occurred when trying to submit the application.
message_cv_delete: Are you sure you want to delete this resume? It will be permanently deleted and cannot be recovered. Please note that all job applications that used this resume will be withdrawn.
delete_cv_err: An error occurred while trying to delete a CV.
delete_cv_success: Your CV has been successfully deleted.
apps_retrieval_err: An error occurred while trying to retrieve the job applications.
sort_app_asc: Sort applications ascending by post date
sort_apps_desc: Sort applications descending by post date
no_apps_explanation_can: The candidate has not applied for any job or nothing matches the selected criteria.
no_apps_explanation_emp: No candidate has applied for this job or nothing matches the selected criteria.
status_progress_can: The recruitment process for this position is ongoing. After each stage the employer will evaluate your candidacy and can determine the new stage or new status.
status_finished_can: The recruitment process for this position has been successfully completed and the employer has decided to select you to fill this position. Congratulations!
status_refused_can: Your recruitment process for this position has been stopped. Reason for refusal:
status_progress_emp: Recruitment for this position is in progress. After each stage, please evaluate the candidate and set the new stage or status.
status_finished_emp: The recruitment process for this position has been successfully completed and the candidate has been hired for this job. Congratulations!
status_refused_emp: The recruitment process for this position with this candidate has been stopped. Reason for refusal:
cv_app_first_can: For this position, you applied with CV:
cv_app_second_can: This CV is the one that can be viewed by the employer for the recruitment process.
cv_app_first_emp: For this position, the candidate applied with CV:
cv_app_second_emp: This CV is the one that can be viewed by the employer for the recruitment process.
message_recruit_delete: Are you sure you want to stop this recruitment process? It will be permanently stopped and cannot be continued. Also, if you want to stop the process, you must justify this choice in the following lines to be able to send it to the employer for transparency.
reason_in: The reason for stopping the recruitment process cannot be left blank.
apps_stop_err: An error occurred while trying to stop the recruitment process.
apps_stop_success: The recruitment process has been successfully stopped.
no_app_company: No application has been added in any company.
profile_img_err: Please upload only image files for your profile.
create_profile_err: An error occurred when trying to create the profile.
update_profile_err: An error occurred when trying to update the profile.
create_profile_subtitle: Before you can continue with the rest of the functionalities, it is necessary to add a profile. Remember that the profile will be visible to all candidates, we recommend one as suggestive and complete as possible.
phone_number_err: The phone number must contain 10 digits.
website_err: The site must be a valid URL.
street_err: The street must have minimum 10 characters (letters, numbers, spaces, period, comma and hyphen).
empty_pass_motivation: The account was created by Google so the password is not provided here
company_err: Company name must contain at least 3 characters (letters, numbers, hyphen, "&" character and spaces).
edit_account_subtitle_emp: Below you can see the information related to your account: email, company name and password. You can press the "Edit" button to change the fields, with the exception of the email address, which can no longer be updated after creating the account.
edit_account_subtitle_can: Below you can see the information related to your account: email, firstname and lastname and password. You can press the "Edit" button to change the fields, with the exception of the email address, which can no longer be updated after creating the account.
stages_error: An error occurred while retrieving available stages.
job_title_error: Title must contain between 5 and 500 characters.
job_desc_error: Description must be at least 100 characters.
stages_p: This step allows specifying the stages that will be taken in the recruitment process, in order to create a transparent and easy-to-follow experience for both the employer and applicant. Important to mention is the fact that apart from the 3 implicit stages, at least one more stage must be added.
custom_stage_err: Stage must contain between 5 and 500 characters.
question_p: This step provides the opportunity to add questions for candidates. Adding questions is optional and provides an opportunity to collect additional information. This functionality facilitates the selection of suitable candidates for the available position.
question_info_desc: Add questions section first if you want.
question_err: Question must contain between 10 and 500 characters.
create_job_err: An error occurred while attempting to add the job.
message_job_delete: Are you sure you want to delete the job? It will be permanently deleted without the possibility of recovery. All recruitment processes for this job will be stopped.
delete_job_err: An error occurred when deleting the job.
update_desc_err: An error occurred when trying to update the description.
apps_next_err: An error occurred while trying to update the recruitment process.
apps_next_success: The recruitment process has been successfully updated.
no_app_stage: There is no stage for this job.
